adDetails: The Braidless sew( Malaysian Sew in) is just as described. Its a sew-in weve where the extension wefts are not attached to a braid as a base instead the individual hair stands becomes a base creating less tension on the scalp . This method is Ideal for those with thin hair, however it is also suitable for all hair types and texture who wish to explore this option. show contact info Ty Two Salon Location Antioch and Oakland ( Same Day Appointments Available) www.styleseat.com/tyegarcia Hair in stock from 12-28 Inches Premium Virgin Brazilian Hair Collection $249.00 Extension / Weave services Include: 2 Bundles of Hair your choice of 12 and 14 inch Premium Brazilian Hair Extensions 1.
